name: Lost & Found (TeamTinyPixel, OrdinaryRam, RabbitMask)
description:
Game made by:

Team Members: Kimu & Jack

This game was created for this year's Global Game Jam '21.
THEME: Lost & Found

You're a Dad Reaper and you're two souls away from getting a promotion to full time Reaper. As you get assigned the location to retrieve the souls something in this house feels familiar to you. What choices will you pick after you learn the truth?
